text:
Shares of Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -0.49%
       shed 1.94% to $184.40 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around poor trading session for the stock market, with the NASDAQ Composite Index 
        COMP,
        +0.55%
       falling 2.23% to 15,164.01 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.07%
       falling 0.82% to 38,150.30. This was the stock's sixth consecutive day of losses. Apple Inc. closed $15.22 below its 52-week high ($199.62), which the company achieved on December 14th. Despite its losses, the stock outperformed some of its competitors Wednesday, as Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        +0.38%
       fell 2.69% to $397.58, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.22%
       fell 7.35% to $141.80, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.27%
       fell 7.50% to $140.10. Trading volume (54.8 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 52.4 M.
